data.title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens Tuesday
data.description: U.S. stock futures rose modestly Tuesday, one day after a late-session tech stock reversal propelled the Nasdaq from an over 2.5% loss to a slight closing gain.

data.title: The residential cruise ship offering a 'more affordable' life at sea
data.description: Launching in 2024, Storylines is selling fully furnished one-to-four-bedroom residences, as well as a two-story penthouse on board its upcoming ship, with prices starting at $400,000 and rising to $8 million.
